short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover referral codes within or outside your network while browsing, and add yours directly to your INVITE CIRCUIT profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover and Share Referral Codes Effortlessly

Unlock the full potential of your online shopping experience with the INVITE CIRCUIT Browser Extension. Seamlessly integrated with the INVITE CIRCUIT platform, this extension is your go-to tool for finding and sharing referral codes, ensuring you never miss out on savings and rewards.

Key Features

1. Find Referral Codes Instantly:
Simply open your browser and navigate to any website. The INVITE CIRCUIT extension will automatically notify you of the number of available referral codes for that site, saving you time and money.

2. Network-Connected Referrals:
If you have an INVITE CIRCUIT profile, the extension leverages your network of friends and family. You’ll see referral codes from both within and outside your network, maximizing your chances of finding the best deals (while supporting friends and family).

3. Public Access for All:
Don’t have an INVITE CIRCUIT account? No problem. You can still access all public referral codes, ensuring you benefit from the community’s shared savings.

4. Manage Your Own Codes:
Easily view your own referral codes directly from the extension. If you have a profile on INVITE CIRCUIT and have uploaded referral codes, they will be shown when you browse relevant websites. Adding new codes to your profile is just a click away.

IMPORTANT INFO

Personalized Experience:
Log in with your INVITE CIRCUIT username by clicking the settings at the bottom of the extension. This personalized login unlocks the full potential of the network function, tailoring your referral code experience to your connections and interests.

Never Miss a Code:
To make sure you always have easy access to referral codes, pin the INVITE CIRCUIT extension to your browser. This ensures you won’t miss out on any valuable codes, making your online shopping more efficient and rewarding.

How It Works

Install the Extension:
Download and install the INVITE CIRCUIT Browser Extension from your browser’s extension store.

Pin the Extension:
Pin the extension to your browser for instant access and to ensure you never miss out on a referral code.

Log In for Full Features:
Click on the settings icon ⚙️ at the bottom of the extension and log in with your INVITE CIRCUIT username to gain easy access to your profile as well as personalized network-based referral codes.

Browse as Usual:
Navigate to any website. The extension will display a notification indicating the number of available referral codes.

Add and Manage Codes:
View your referral codes and add new ones to your INVITE CIRCUIT profile directly through the extension.

Why Choose the INVITE CIRCUIT Extension?

- Seamless Integration: Directly linked with the INVITE CIRCUIT platform for a unified experience.
- Network Benefits: Harness the power of your network to find the best referral codes.
- User-Friendly: Easy to install, use, and manage, with clear notifications and simple settings.
- Maximize Savings: Access a wide range of referral codes, both public and network-specific, to save more on your purchases.
